title: Anomaly Flow: Shi-Type Estimates and Long-time Existence
abstract:
We consider the long-time existence of the anomaly flow on a compact complex
$3$-fold with general slope parameter $\alpha'$. In particular, we obtain
integral Shi-type estimates for the flow by adapting a integration-by-parts
type argument instead of the usual maximum principle techniques. Following
this, we prescribe a sufficient smallness condition on $\alpha'$ in order to
extend the flow on $[0,\tau)$ to $[0,\tau + \epsilon)$.
